Bulletin No: 16: Issued by the Natural Hazards Early Warning Centre
Issued at 10.00 a.m. on 25 July 2025 for the period until 10.00 a.m. on 26 July 2025

column2: For the sea areas extending from Kalpitiya to Kankasanthurai via

Bulletin No: 16:
P
LEASE BE AWARE!

T
he  sea  areas  extending
Kankasanthurai  via  Mannar  will  be  rough  or
very rough with strong gusty winds up to (60-
70) kmph.
Naval and fishing communities are advised not
to venture into  the sea areas extending from

next 24 hours.

he  sea  areas  off  the  coast  extending  from

Hambantota 
and 
from
Trincomalee via Mullaittivu will be fairly rough

The naval and fishing communities engaged in
